titleStmt.title: Nevves, true newes, laudable newes, citie newes, court news, countrey newes: the world is mad, or it is a mad world my masters, especially now when in the antipodes these things are come to passe.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Cowles, T. Bates, and T. Banks,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
